abstract: Caterpillar, the world’s largest maker of construction and mining equipment, said Thursday that Douglas R. Oberhelman will become the company’s next chief executive.
snippet: Caterpillar, the world’s largest maker of construction and mining equipment, said Thursday that Douglas R. Oberhelman will become the company’s next chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Caterpillar, the world’s largest maker of construction and mining equipment, said Thursday that Douglas R. Oberhelman wouldbecome the company’s next chief executive.
